key_talking_points: The Florida Panthers visit Rogers Place to take on the Edmonton Oilers. Florida is currently leading 5 to 4 coming into the first period.
Both teams have demonstrated strong offensive capabilities so far, with Florida recording 42 shots on goal and Edmonton close behind with 46.
